configuration.analyzeTable: Specific table names to operate on
configuration.analyzeSchema: Schema to be analyzed, vacuumed, or encoded
configuration.dbPassword: Your base64 encoded encrypted password here (generated with encrypt_password.py)
configuration.force: Do you want to force the utility to run for each provided table or schema, even if changes are not required? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.debug: Should the utilities run in debug mode? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.do-execute: Should changes be made automatically, or just for reporting purposes (boolean - true |  false | default true)
configuration.analyze_col_width: Analyze columns wider than this value (int)
configuration.ssl-option: Should you connect to the cluster with SSL? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.doVacuum: Should the Analyze Vacuum utility run Vacuum? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.doAnalyze: Should the Analyze Vacuum utility run Analyze? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.tableBlacklist: comma separated list of tables to suppress running the analyze vacuum utility against
configuration.aggregationInterval: Interval on which to summarise database statistics (redshift interval literal: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/dg/r_interval_literals.html | default '1 hour'
configuration.clusterName: The cluster name that is the first part of the DNS name
